work.name: Dimonoff

work.name: Unity
work.summary: As a DevOps Engineer on the Cloud Media Platform team, a core part of Unity Cloud services, I played a significant role in the collaborative effort to successfully launch the new Unity Cloud in a short 9-month timeframe.
highlights: Migration of the whole Cloud infrastructure from GCP to Azure. Use Terraform for IaC. Setting up the infrastructure from scratch.
Provide infrastructure support to different development teams.
Monitoring services using Grafana and Prometheus.
Create and manage GitHub workflows to deploy internal and third-party services.

work.name: Axes Network
work.summary: At Axes, I took on critical roles in several projects, demonstrating my leadership and technical capabilities. As Lead Developer of the LID product, I managed the TiTo system for casinos, oversaw its operation and maintenance, and managed production releases. I also played a crucial role as Software Architect/Lead Developer for the Cashdesk product, where I led the design and architecture of a kiosk-style system, as well as the backend and frontend teams.
highlights: Integration of cloud solutions to optimize transaction processing such as Kafka and RabbitMQ. As well as Elasticsearch to optimize the log system.
Development of a new ticket management service to replace the old one.
Implementation of a private Identity provider like AWS IAM.
